BDA

Class TwitterAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • BDA.TwitterAPI

  • public class TwitterAPI
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TwitterAPI()
      Reads the AcessToken from the XML file, connects to twitter and gets the list of tweets made by the user.
